name: STAT_COMPLETED_IN_A_ROW
displayName: Number of completed levels in a row

name: STAT_PLAYBUTTON_PRESSED
displayName: How many times the "Play" button was pressed

name: STAT_GAME_LAUNCHED
displayName: How many times Grocket was launched

name: STAT_FULL_STAR_LEVELS
displayName: Number of levels completed with all 3 stars

name: STAT_COLORMODE_CHANGES
displayName: Number of colormode changes in Colormode levels

name: STAT_TANKS_COLLECTED
displayName: Amount of collected tanks in fuel levels

name: STAT_VELOCITYFIELDS_ENTERED
displayName: How many times a VelocityField was entered

name: STAT_KILLED_BY_LASER
displayName: Amount of deaths caused by lasers

name: STAT_SECONDS_IN_PLAYMODE
displayName: Time spent while playing in levels

name: STAT_CURRENT_COINS
displayName: Amount of coins the player has

name: STAT_COMPLETED_SM_BOSSLEVELS
displayName: Number of completed bosslevels in storymode
